# checksupporteR

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of supporteR is an R package to support data management initially starting with kobo tools data in ensuring its quality.

## Installation

You can install the development version of supporteR from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

```{r, eval=FALSE}
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("twesigye10/supporteR")

```

## Load package

After installing the package, you can then load it as follows:

```{r loading_package}
library(supporteR)
```
